title: FS T207 and T205 (Piedmont 42) Howie Camnitz  (BOTH SOLD to L)
author: B O'Brien

posts.post_title: FS T207 and T205 (Piedmont 42) Howie Camnitz  (BOTH SOLD to L)
posts.post_content:
Hello all,
I have decided that the world of Howie Camnitz collecting is to big to venture outside of the T206's for the time being.
Here are my two non-T206 Camnitz cards.

T207 Howie Camnitz $30 delivered (formerly SGC 30)
T205 Piedmont Factory 42 Howie Camnitz $40 delivered (formery PSA 2)
BOTH CARDS ARE SOLD!!  THANKS
Thanks,
Bob
[url]upperhandisforemost@yahoo.com[/url]

Sorry for the bump, but looking to sell some stuff tonight.  The wife wants money!
Bob
